directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute garlic in the butter until fragrant. Add the asparagus, cover, and cook for 2 minutes, then pour in the wine, and add the raisins. Cook uncovered until wine has evaporated and asparagus is tender, about 4 minutes. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 bunch fresh asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
title: Divine Asparagus
